I'll blow up the ship Monday since some of the players aren't back 
till then.

Phobias ship detected a pulse from the engine room (The timer) "What 
now, single pulse, steady time, Oh frag, Computer, dump main engines"

The computer responded "Dumping in three minutes." the ship could 
save itself if it had the time.

(Since Phobias such an arrogant bot he assumes it will, but I'm sure 
everybody knows what happens when you assume.)

--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, minime_316@h... wrote:
> OOC: They would if they were sports about the game. I add a post 
but 
> I don't want the clock to tick any more without the Preds getting a 
> chance to respond.
